column1: The customer was redirected to their bank page to complete 3D authentication. On this scenario two things can happen:
column2: The customer was redirected to their bank page to complete 3D authentication. On this scenario two things can happen:

column1: - The customer completes the 3D check and the order status is updated.
column2: - The customer completes the 3D check and the order status is updated.

column1: - The customer does not complete 3D and the message will still be visible. For example, the customer does not remember their pin code.
column2: - The customer does not complete 3D and the message will still be visible. For example, the customer does not remember their pin code.
